channel.title: The Lone Ranger
channel.description:
I wasn't expecting much from this movie, especially after the critics gave it horrible reviews. I thought it was actually a pretty good movie, though. The critics must have seen a different movie because I thought it was good. Johnny Depp was great and so was Armie Hammer (Played Lone Ranger, and yes I looked up his name :P).
I didn't see any of the old Lone Ranger TV shows or anything, but I went to see it with my Grandpa (because he was a big fan) and he thought it was an amazing movie.
I would like to hear what anyone else who saw this movie thought.

item.title: The Lone Ranger
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Just saw it with my wife and it was actually pretty good!
